title: What causes aging of the upper lip? Loss of volume, not just 'sagging'

title_detail.value: What causes aging of the upper lip? Loss of volume, not just 'sagging'

summary: Plastic surgeons have long debated the mechanisms aging-related changes in the face: Are they related more to 'deflation' or 'sagging'? A new study helps settle the debate, showing significant loss of volume in the upper lip in older adults.
